caption: Two men are plotting, with one of them seated in a chair, appearing to hold a higher position, and engaged in official matters. The other man is trying to persuade him, and his expressions are quite exaggerated. Afterward, they seem to reach an agreement or make a request, and the younger man says something before leaving.Meanwhile, in another location, a group of people leaves a castle. They arrive at a tree in the midst of heavy snow, and the tree has an open mouth. They make an oath in front of the tree. At this moment, a wolf approaches and offers them a hand.In another place, a woman is walking inside a pitch-black house.
